page.title: 02Summary cont.
page.content: Much of the land is now farmed.The main crops are Wheat,Barley and Oil Seed Rape.Several farmers have sheep but most of the cattle have been replaced gradually due to more profitable crop production. There are 3 Junior Schools and 1 Comprehensive School:-{Nettlesworth {County J.Mx & Inf., Sacriston County {J.Mx & Inf. and Cross Lane Infant { schools}provide education for about 600 children up to the age of 11 years.{Fyndoune Comprehensive} provides Secondary Education for about 900 children. (Children from Nettlesworth School transfer to Framwellgate Moor Comprehensive School)
